column10: Before shot blasting, a section of scratch was found on the bevel of the unbalanced wheel hub, and there was a dent at one end of the scratch. It has been marked with a red pen
column11: Confirm, with the unbalanced side facing up, there are scratches on the hub bevel corresponding to holes 18 to 30 in the marking direction. Two sets of data have been measured and are attached. Awaiting QA processing. Updated DA on 2025.12.11. According to the rework order, the rework results are OK, visually inspected and dimensionally checked. Updated on 2025.12.18
